text: Anɨb ak yad nɨbop agnɨgebin, Yislel binɨb kɨli apyap pakɨlak ak, pɨsnep apyap pakɨl kul gɨnɨgel akaŋ? Mel yɨbɨl, anɨb ma gɨlak. Kɨli pen tap tɨmel gɨlak tek, God ne binɨb Juda mel okok kɨlop tɨg asɨk dak. Ne yad binɨb anɨb okok tɨg asɨk den nɨm, Yislel binɨb kɨli ne chɨnop tek anɨgɨl ma tɨg asɨk dup agɨl, yɨp yɨl ownɨgel agɨl anɨgak.
